replies.body:
The problem with TFT

Are 3 mainly:

1.- It is somewhat complicated to know where you are at the beginning, and when you know where you are, you have to try to choose a champion.
2.- Due to the first problem, the start time is very short and the times between games are very long, sometimes there are 15 seconds between round and round that could be added at the beginning.
3.- The objects that fall depend to a large extent on the rng, sometimes 3 articles come out in the first 3 rounds and, sometimes, nothing, you suddenly find someone who has a guardian angel and you only wear armor.
